attributes.action: Place a limit on the brightness of vehicle low beams
attributes.additional_details: An RAC survey stated more than 80% of UK drivers feel affected by headlight glare and believed the problem was getting worse. The poll also indicated 89% thought some car headlights were too bright. At risk of accidents and dangerous driving, mandatory alteration and limits are needed to promote safer roads for the public.
attributes.background: Limit the brightness allowed for car headlight low beams in the UK to create safer roads at night for all drivers
